text: Ann C. Frank Lewis (born December 19, 1937) is an American Democratic Party strategist and communicator. Lewis was the White House Communications Director in the Clinton administration from 1997 to 1999. Lewis was co-chair for Jewish Women for the Hillary Clinton 2016 presidential campaign. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:American political commentators Category:American political writers Category:American television writers Category:Politicians from Jersey City, New Jersey Category:White House Communications Directors Category:Politicians from Massachusetts Category:Writers from Massachusetts Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Writers from Jersey City, New Jersey Category:Jewish American politicians Category:Jewish American writers
title: Ann Lewis
